comment: Wrapper for outputting an index.htm for multiple TestSuites
constructorsignature: Function New(title As String) As TestRunner
commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Wrapper for outputting an index.htm for multiple TestSuites&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
commenthtml: Wrapper for outputting an index.htm for multiple TestSuites

methods.label: New
methods.signature: Function New(title As String) As TestRunner

methods.label: Delete
methods.comment: Destructor. Prints out reports and erases test suites List.
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Destructor. Prints out reports and erases test suites List.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Destructor. Prints out reports and erases test suites List.

methods.label: getFilePath
methods.comment: Gets the directory to save the HTML / XML output to.
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New TestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Print &quot;Tests will be written to &quot; & testRunner.getFilePath()) & &quot; as &quot; & testRunner.getOutputFormat()
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Gets the directory to save the HTML / XML output to.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Gets the directory to save the HTML / XML output to.
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testRunner as New TestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Print &quot;Tests will be written to &quot; & testRunner.getFilePath()) & &quot; as &quot; & testRunner.getOutputFormat()

methods.label: createTestSuite
methods.comment: Creates a new TestSuite with a label and adds it to this TestRunner
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New TestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim currentSuite as TestSuite
Set currentSuite = testRunner.createTestSuite(&quot;Tests1&quot;)
methods.signature: Function createTestSuite(title As String) As TestSuite
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Creates a new TestSuite with a label and adds it to this TestRunner&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Creates a new TestSuite with a label and adds it to this TestRunner
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testRunner as New TestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Dim currentSuite as TestSuite&lt;br /&gt;Set currentSuite = testRunner.createTestSuite(&quot;Tests1&quot;)

methods.label: addTestSuite
methods.comment: Adds a TestSuite to this BaliTestRunner
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim testSuite as New BaliTestSuite(&quot;Tests1&quot;)
Call testRunner.addTestSuite(testSuite)
methods.commenthtml: Adds a TestSuite to this BaliTestRunner
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testRunner as New BaliTestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Dim testSuite as New BaliTestSuite(&quot;Tests1&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Call testRunner.addTestSuite(testSuite)

arguments.label: testSuite
arguments.comment: TestSuite to add to this TestRunner
arguments.commenthtml: TestSuite to add to this TestRunner

methods.label: outputTo
methods.comment: Sets a directory to write reports to.
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New TestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Call testRunner.outputTo(&quot;unit-tests/&quot;)
methods.signature: Function outputTo(outputLoc As String) As TestRunner
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Sets a directory to write reports to.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Sets a directory to write reports to.

methods.label: setOutputFormat
methods.comment: Sets the output format for the reports
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New TestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Call testRunner.setOutputFormat(&quot;BOTH&quot;)
methods.signature: Function setOutputFormat(formatType As String) As TestRunner
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Sets the output format for the reports&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Sets the output format for the reports

methods.label: getOutputFormat
methods.comment: Getter for the output format, default is HTML.
methods.codesample:
Dim testRunner as New TestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Print &quot;Tests will be written to &quot; & testRunner.getFilePath()) & &quot; as &quot; & testRunner.getOutputFormat()
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Getter for the output format, default is HTML.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Getter for the output format, default is HTML.
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testRunner as New TestRunner(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Print &quot;Tests will be written to &quot; & testRunner.getFilePath()) & &quot; as &quot; & testRunner.getOutputFormat()
